qcfpunch:AsceticMonk.NAME: 苦行僧
qcfpunch:AsceticMonk.DESCRIPTION: 初始拥有断牙， 头骨项链 和 观音莲花苑。 Sometimes, you have to remove the excess.

qcfpunch:BlazingFist.NAME: 炙热龙拳
qcfpunch:BlazingFist.DESCRIPTION: 初始拥有黑色训练衬衫，红色道服和不灭烈火 Who needs Block?

qcfpunch:BlueJade.NAME: 玉兰花
qcfpunch:BlueJade.DESCRIPTION: 初始拥有护手刺，白靴和手铐。 If uncertain... you have time kid.

qcfpunch:DeltaSpike.NAME: 三角洲特种。
qcfpunch:DeltaSpike.DESCRIPTION: 初始拥有红色贝雷帽，绿色紧身衣和特种作战徽章 Draw, draw, prepare, action!

qcfpunch:FreshStart.NAME: 清新开局
qcfpunch:FreshStart.DESCRIPTION: 开局不带初始遗物。 Who needs Ironclad's Boiling Blood, am I right? :)

qcfpunch:HalfHealthBar.NAME: 半血
qcfpunch:HalfHealthBar.DESCRIPTION: 开局拥有 50% 的生命上限。 Also 200% courage and 200% OUCH.

qcfpunch:IndestructibleFortress.NAME: 不动要塞
qcfpunch:IndestructibleFortress.DESCRIPTION: 初始拥有军靴，铭牌和迷彩服。 Because the best defense... is the best defense, duh.

qcfpunch:LoweringTheHandicap.NAME: 降低门槛
qcfpunch:LoweringTheHandicap.DESCRIPTION: 开局拥有 125% 的生命上限。

qcfpunch:QuarterHealthBar.NAME: 红血
qcfpunch:QuarterHealthBar.DESCRIPTION: 开局拥有 25% 的生命上限。 Congrats if you beat the Heart without any Max HP increase and this modifier!

qcfpunch:RedCyclone.NAME: 红色旋风
qcfpunch:RedCyclone.DESCRIPTION: 初始拥有 摔跤斗篷， 野药膏 和 红色旋风指南 .  Getting stronger with pain and then stunning all opposition.

qcfpunch:UnboundedCreativity.NAME: 无限的创造力
qcfpunch:UnboundedCreativity.DESCRIPTION: 初始拥有彩虹刷子。随机多色骗局!

qcfpunch:WanderingWarrior.NAME: 修行格斗家
qcfpunch:WanderingWarrior.DESCRIPTION: 初始拥有旅行袋，格斗手套和红色头带。 You don't excel, but have the tools to surpass any challenge.
